segments.text: Cindy , how come nearly all the prime-time TV shows are comedies ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Situation comedies . A sitcom is half an hour long and it airs weekly . Sitcom shows tend to be about ordinary people . If there is one thing that all the shows have in common , it is teaching wholesome values .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In Taiwan , prime-time shows are an hour long and most of them aren't comedies .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think Americans would rather laugh than cry or be scared in their free time .
segments.speaker: S2
